trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that can contain text and images.
trans-unit.target: 表示可选择<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> ，可以包含文本和图像。

trans-unit.source: Use ToolStripButton to create a toolbar button that supports both text and images.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ToolStripButton 创建支持文本和图像的工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to get or set the positioning of ToolStripButton images and text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，以获取或设置的 ToolStripButton 图像和文本定位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display a ToolStripButton with various border styles, and you can use it to represent and activate operational states.
trans-unit.target: 可以显示与各种边框样式，ToolStripButton 还可用来表示和激活的操作状态。

trans-unit.source: You can also define it to have the focus by default.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以定义其默认情况下具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStripButton replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 ToolStripButton 替换并扩展<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>的早期版本中，控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>以备向后兼容性和将来使用保留。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified image.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>显示指定的图像的类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only an image on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>仅显示图像的时间为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在上显示图像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>类来显示指定的文本。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only text on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>仅显示文本的时间为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.target: 要在上显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>显示指定的文本和图像的类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>显示的图像和文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要在上显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在上显示图像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>类显示的指定的文本和图像，并在引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>显示图像和文本和引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>单击时的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要在上显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 在上显示图像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> class with the specified name that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>类具有指定名称的显示指定的文本和图像，并在引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> with the specified name that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>具有指定名称，以显示图像和文本及引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>单击时的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要在上显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default or custom <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> text is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否默认或自定义<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>上显示文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Set the AutoToolTip property to `false` to display custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 将 AutoToolTip 属性设置为`false`以显示自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>的时间为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> text is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果默认<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>文本是显示; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>可以选择。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>可选定; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> is pressed or not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>按下还是未按下。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> is pressed in or not pressed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>是中的按下还是未按下; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>应自动显示已按下状态或未按下，单击时。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>应自动显示已按下状态或未按下，当单击; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> is in the pressed or not pressed state by default, or is in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>处于默认情况下，按下或未按下状态或者处于不确定状态。

trans-unit.source: Set the CheckState to `Indeterminate` when you do not want to set a default state.
trans-unit.target: 设置为复选`Indeterminate`不要设置的默认状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的辅助功能对象为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call CreateAccessibilityInstance, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 CreateAccessibilityInstance，它时将会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>引用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to display the ToolTip that is defined as the default.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否显示工具提示，被定义为默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref> can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: 检索到的矩形区域的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>可以拟合。

trans-unit.source: The specified area for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 类型的有序的对<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>表示的宽度和高度的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCheckedChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>
